Mentor Guide:
Up to 3 Apprentices can be taken at a time. Every time a student raises a level, the mentor receives an item called Apprentice sign. These signs can be exchanged for useful items.
[Number of Marks Apprentice for reaching different levels]
Level 85:5000
Level 99:10 000
Level 103: 25000
Level 105: 60 000
If the Mentor and The Apprentice are in play, the student appears powerful positive effects. The mentor also receives Effects affecting the increase in experience and SP.
